title: Deep reals
content:
Itâ€™s never been more difficult to tell whether what we see online is real or fake. AI bots are being paid to leave fake reddit comments, Drake resurrected Tupac in a rap verse, and Morgan Freeman is still not Morgan Freeman. Tony Blinken playing guitar in Kyiv turned out to be real, though.

The post Deep reals appeared first on Union Square Ventures.
author: Grace Carney
